name: Tamem “Tom” Jalallar
title: Senior IT Systems Administrator | Technical Lead | AV & VIP Support
summary: Senior IT Systems Administrator and Technical Lead with 6+ years of enterprise experience supporting executive leadership, driving automation, and leading high-impact infrastructure and AV initiatives. Proven mentor with a track record of streamlining operations and improving reliability, security, and user satisfaction.
skills: Identity & Access Management (Okta, Entra, Azure AD)

experience.role: Senior IT Systems Administrator / AV & VIP Support
bullets: Executive-level and VIP support; serve as escalation point for high-priority incidents.
Lead AV production for town halls and leadership events (recording, audio/video, live operations).
Administer IAM and endpoint platforms: Okta, Entra/Azure AD, Intune, Kandji, Jamf, ABM.
Build and maintain PowerShell automation to reduce manual workload and improve consistency.
Provision and deploy Macs/PCs; manage onboarding, access, and compliance workflows.
Manage ServiceNow queues and resolver groups; drive ticket hygiene and operational follow-through.
Grew eCommerce traffic and orders through marketing operations and weekly newsletters.
Maintained a customer database of 10,000+ entries and supported customer engagement.
